net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.filters

Class Lens2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.filters.Filter<Lens2>
      • net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.filters.Lens2

  • public final class Lens2
extends Filter<Lens2>
    Lens flare effect as described in John Chapman's article (without lens dirt or diffraction starburst). Lens color image (lenscolor.png) is located in src/main/resources/ folder.
    See Also:
    http://john-chapman-graphics.blogspot.co.uk/2013/02/pseudo-lens-flare.html
